article_title: Florida Gov. Rick Scott Calls on GOP to Coalesce Behind Donald Trump
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Florida Gov. Rick Scott threw his support behind GOP frontrunner Donald Trump on Wednesday, saying it is time Republicans “come together.”

“With his victories yesterday, I believe it is now time for Republicans to accept and respect the will of the voters and coalesce behind Donald Trump,” Scott stated.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Trump responded on Twitter:
